# 统一输出目录
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${THIRD_PARTY_BUILD_DIR}/lib")
set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${THIRD_PARTY_BUILD_DIR}/lib")
set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${THIRD_PARTY_BUILD_DIR}/bin")

# 多配置处理
if(CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES)
    foreach(CFG_TYPE IN LISTS CMAKE_CONFIGURATION_TYPES)
        string(TOUPPER ${CFG_TYPE} CFG_TYPE)
        set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_${CFG_TYPE} "${THIRD_PARTY_BUILD_DIR}/lib/${CFG_TYPE}")
        set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_${CFG_TYPE} "${THIRD_PARTY_BUILD_DIR}/lib/${CFG_TYPE}")
    endforeach()
endif()

# 全局构建选项
option(BUILD_TESTING "Enable testing" OFF)
mark_as_advanced(BUILD_TESTING)
